sections.title: Why a custom referral and recommendation platform?
sections.content:
In today's competitive talent landscape, relying solely on job boards leaves you missing out on the best candidates. Employee referrals consistently lead to faster hires, lower cost-per-hire, and higher retention rates. A custom-built platform allows you to tap into your team's networks intelligently.

Off-the-shelf solutions are often generic, expensive, and don't integrate seamlessly with your unique hiring workflow. Building your own means you get a system that perfectly aligns with your company culture, compensation structures, and talent acquisition strategy. With Kliv, this capability is now within reach for any organization, regardless of technical expertise.

sections.title: The strategic advantage of tailored referral systems
sections.content:
## The limitations of standard recruitment tools

Many organizations struggle with recruitment despite investing heavily in Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) and job boards. This is often because:

- **Passive talent pools**: They don't effectively engage existing employees in the search for new talent.
- **Generic referral processes**: Manual or disconnected referral processes lead to lost candidate data and frustrated employees.
- **Lack of tracking & incentives**: It's hard to track referral success, incentivize employees, or manage payouts effectively.
- **Inefficient recommendations**: Struggling to get specific, timely recommendations from internal experts for niche roles.

## Why a custom-built solution changes the game

Building your own referral and recommendation platform addresses these issues head-on, offering significant benefits:

### Maximize internal talent networks
Your employees are your greatest asset. A custom platform empowers them to easily refer qualified candidates and feel valued in the hiring process. This leads to a higher volume of quality leads from trusted sources.

### Streamlined referral management
Automate the entire referral lifecycle, from submission to tracking, interview scheduling, and payout processing. Reduce administrative burden and ensure no great candidate slips through the cracks.

### Targeted recommendations on demand
Beyond general referrals, enable hiring managers to specifically request recommendations from relevant employees for hard-to-fill or specialized roles, leveraging internal expertise directly.

### Enhanced employee engagement
When employees see their referrals moving through the pipeline and potentially leading to successful hires and rewards, it fosters a sense of ownership and contribution to company growth.

### Optimal integration with existing systems
Design your platform to natively integrate with your existing ATS, HRIS, and communication tools, creating a single source of truth for all hiring activities without cumbersome workarounds.

## Real-world impact

Custom referral and recommendation platforms can revolutionize hiring:

**Tech Startups**: Rapidly scale teams by engaging engineers to refer talent from their professional networks, with automated tracking and referral bonuses.

**Healthcare Systems**: Centralize nurse and doctor recommendations from existing staff, ensuring cultural fit and professional competence in critical roles.

**Consulting Firms**: Facilitate partners and senior consultants in recommending industry-specific experts, with clear visibility into candidate status and incentive eligibility.

**Manufacturing**: Empower shop floor supervisors to recommend skilled tradespeople, reducing reliance on expensive agencies and fostering a strong internal community.

## The Kliv advantage in custom development

Building sophisticated internal tools like a referral platform used to be costly and time-consuming. Kliv‚Äôs AI-powered development significantly lowers this barrier:

- **Intuitive no-code/low-code interface**: Translate your HR process needs into a functional application without deep technical knowledge.
- **Rapid iteration**: Quickly adjust features and workflows as your hiring needs evolve.
- **Secure and scalable**: Build a robust system that handles sensitive candidate data and grows with your organization.

Invest in a hiring platform that works for you, not one that dictates your process. With Kliv, you can build a system that turns your employees into your most effective recruiters.

sections.title: Referral platform ideas to get you started

items.description: Allow employees to submit candidates and track their status internally.
items.prompt: Create a referral system where employees can submit candidate resumes, add notes on their relationship, and view the real-time status (e.g., 'Submitted', 'Interviewing', 'Hired') of their referred candidates.
items.title: Basic Employee Referral Portal

items.description: Automate bonus payouts and clearly communicate policies.
items.prompt: Develop a referral platform that automates the calculation and tracking of referral bonuses, notifies referrers upon successful hires, and integrates with payroll for payout processing, adhering to defined bonus tiers.
items.title: Referral Bonus Management System

items.description: Engage department heads to suggest suitable candidates actively.
items.prompt: Build a recommendation system where hiring managers can submit requests for candidate recommendations for specific open roles to a pool of internal experts, and experts can easily submit vetted recommendations with their rationale.
items.title: Internal Expert Recommendation Engine

items.description: Gamify referrals with leaderboards and incentives.
items.prompt: Design a gamified referral platform that includes a leaderboard for top referrers, assigns points for different referral stages (submission, interview, hire), and allows for customizable rewards or recognition based on accumulated points.
items.title: Gamified Referral Program

items.description: Integrate with external platforms for seamless data flow.
items.prompt: Create a platform that integrates with our existing ATS (Applicant Tracking System) so that referred candidates are automatically added to the recruitment pipeline with a 'referred' tag, and status updates are synced back to the referrer portal.
items.title: ATS-Integrated Referral System

items.description: Provide a clear view of all current referral opportunities.
items.prompt: Build a dynamic job board within the referral platform that highlights all open positions eligible for referral bonuses, categorizes them by department or skill set, and includes details on the referral reward for each role.
items.title: Referral Eligible Job Board

items.prompt: Add a feature for employees to share job postings directly to their social media networks with trackable links, crediting them for resulting applications.
items.title: Social Sharing & Tracking

items.prompt: Implement an AI-powered matching system that suggests suitable open roles to employees based on their referred candidates' skills and experience, and vice versa.
items.title: AI-Powered Job Matching

items.prompt: Include an automated feedback loop for referrers, providing insights (without revealing sensitive details) on why their candidate was or wasn't a fit.
items.title: Automated Referrer Feedback

items.prompt: Develop a 'diversity referral' component that encourages and tracks referrals from underrepresented groups, potentially offering specific incentives.
items.title: Diversity Referral Focus

items.prompt: Create a secure messaging system within the platform allowing referrers to communicate directly with recruiters about their candidates' status.
items.title: In-Platform Communication

items.prompt: Add an analytics dashboard for HR and recruiting teams to monitor referral source effectiveness, time-to-hire for referred candidates, and ROI of referral bonuses.
items.title: Referral Analytics Dashboard

items.description: Streamlined interface for employees to submit candidate information and attach resumes.
items.title: Candidate Submission

items.description: Real-time updates on candidate status throughout the recruitment pipeline for referrers.
items.title: Status Tracking

items.description: Integrated rules for calculating and triggering referral bonus payments based on successful hires.
items.title: Automated Incentives

items.description: Module for managers to request specific candidate recommendations from internal experts.
items.title: Recommendation Requests

items.description: Secure storage and management of sensitive candidate and employee data.
items.title: Data Security

items.description: Seamless data exchange with existing HR and Applicant Tracking Systems.
items.title: Seamless Integration

items.answer: A basic functional referral platform can be built in a matter of hours or days using Kliv's platform. More complex systems with advanced AI or deep integrations might take a few weeks to perfect.
items.question: How long does it take to develop a custom referral platform?

items.answer: No, Kliv allows you to describe your desired features in natural language, and the AI assists in generating the application components. You don't need to write code.
items.question: Do I need coding experience to build this type of platform?

items.answer: Yes. Kliv-built applications are designed for flexible integration. You can connect your platform to existing ATS, HRIS, payroll systems, and communication tools (like Slack or email) using APIs.
items.question: Can the custom platform integrate with our existing HR systems?

items.answer: You own 100% of the platform you build with Kliv. This includes the code, data, and intellectual property. You have complete control over its deployment and future modifications.
items.question: Who owns the platform once it's built?

items.answer: Building a custom platform with Kliv is typically a one-time investment. This often proves more cost-effective in the long run than recurring subscription fees for off-the-shelf software, especially when factoring in the exact fit for your needs.
items.question: How does the cost compare to off-the-shelf referral software?

items.answer: Absolutely. Your custom platform can be continuously evolved. As your hiring needs change or new features are desired, you can easily modify or expand the system using Kliv's intuitive development environment.
items.question: Can I modify or add new features after the initial build?

items.answer: Yes, custom-built solutions often provide superior security. You define the security protocols, host the data where you prefer, and control access permissions, reducing reliance on third-party vendor security practices.
